alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 5:35PM MST until August 19 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 534 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bosque, or near Gila Bend, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field and Bosque. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 114 and 131. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
